The planters plea· Or The grounds of plantations examined, and vsuall objections answered Together with a manifestation of the causes mooving such as have lately vndertaken a plantation in Nevv-England: for the satisfaction of those that question the lawfulnesse of the action. White, John, 1575-1648.
[4], 84 p.
Printed by William Iones [, M. Flesher, and J. Dawson], London : 1630.
By John White. "Jones pr[inted]. quire A and posibly H-I; Flesher B-G; Dawson K-M"--STC. Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
